events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan request to cover medical expenses incurred last month.
Loan application has been categorised under personal loans due to the nature of medical related expenses.
A loan officer has been assigned to review and manage the applicant's personal loan request.
The initial review of the personal loan application is underway, checking eligibility and completeness.
Requesting supporting documents including medical bills, identity proof, and income statements from applicant.
Applicant has submitted all the requested medical bills, identification, and pay slips for verification.
The credit history of the applicant was checked and found to be mostly positive with minor past delays.
Risk assessment was conducted assessing the applicant's repayment ability given current financial condition.
Loan offer with terms and interest rates was presented to the applicant for medical expense coverage.
Applicant provided feedback indicating understanding of terms but requested a slightly longer repayment schedule.
The application was escalated to senior management to review applicant’s request for extended repayment terms.
Loan application approved with modified repayment schedule accommodating the applicant's feedback for medical loan.
Approved loan amount was funded to the applicant’s bank account promptly to cover urgent medical bills.
Follow-up call confirmed that the applicant has used the funds appropriately and is satisfied with the loan.
The personal loan application case has been successfully closed following completion of funding and follow-up.
